text: Chinese bird spider is an English name given to several species of old-world tarantulas which are found in China and Vietnam, including: * Cyriopagopus hainanus, primarily found on Hainan Island, off the southeastern coast of China; synonym Haplopelma hainanum * Cyriopagopus schmidti, found in Vietnam; synonyms Haplopelma schmidti, Haplopelma huwenum and Selenocosmia huwena Category:Set indices on spiders
title: Chinese bird spider
